Function reference

All functions

add_style_wrapper()
Generate a style with variable color or bolding
add_style_wrapper_billion()
Generate a style with variable color or bolding
affected_pathogens
outputs to fade out pathongens not applicable to country.
all_billions_example
Example dataset of all three billions
as_excel_formula()
Coerce coerce column to Excel Formula
assert_valid_BorderStyle()
Validate BorderStyle
assert_valid_Colour()
Validate colour inputed
assert_valid_style_parameters()
Assert that style parameters are valid
col2hex()
Converts rgb colour to hex colour
convert_wash_name()
Convert WASH names to remove the urban/rural element
count_since()
Count number of data points since specified date
excel_hex_colour()
Converts colour to Excel hex colour
excel_styles()
Create basic Excel Styles and provides a way to modify them
export_all_countries_summaries_xls()
Export all countries summaries to Excel

Export country summary to Excel

export_uhc_country_summary_xls()
Export country summary to Excel for UHC billion export_uhc_country_summary_xls Export a country-specific for UHC billion.

Get baseline and projections data frame for specified dates
get_data_type()
Gets data type of data frame for styling

Gets data type for styling

get_ind_order()
Get order of indicator
get_latest_reported_df()
Get latest reported data frame
get_transform_formula()

get_transform_formula_single()

Force merge cell
